column4: I'm running 7.04 and Firefox and I'm having a problem with flash audio not playing on the correct soundcard. I run two soundcards in my box and sound from flash videos is not playing on the correct card. Is there a way I change it or specify which card the sounds should play on?
I've always had that work, check into the alsa docs i'm really not sure
in your sound settings in preferences you can pick the default card
